God awful service and quality of work. They fact that Home Depot refers then is a shame on Home Depot.  They don't keep appointments our communicate. Congrats Home Depot on finding the absolute cheapest, careless, company to make your customers angry and dtive then straight to Lowes for their future home improvement needs.

Everyone loves to compare it to In-N-Out because of it's freshness and simplicity, but it tastes nothing like an In-N-Out burger!
It has a delicious sauce on it, the meat is seasoned differently...
It's less comfort food and more delicious. 

Great if you're looking for a quick bite. About a 10 minute wait around noon. Quality Food. Nice Employees. Chill interior.

I would come back every-time I visit Las Vegas.
LOVE this place!! The beef and veggies is amazing and so is their lo mein! Very clean, and the service is fast!

I have never in my life left the doctors office crying until I entered legacy urgent care. I went there for severe back pain. My first visit I was given medication, X-ray was done and had to get a MRI done. Three days after my first visit I went back in because the medication wasn't working.. When I was asked what was wrong I would begin to explain and would be interrupted every time. I was not given the chance to finish. The doctor gave me stronger meds and sent me on my way. After I went for my MRI I went back into get my results. The doctor explained to me that in the MRI there was nothing really serious and that I should be alright. When I was asked if I was ready to go back to work I informed the doctor that I was still feeling pain. This is when I felt the Jekyll and Hyde situation happened. He went from happy to pissed and 1.5 seconds. He began to yell at me telling me I didn't want to go back to work and he refused to fill out any FMLA papers that I needed to hand into work. He filled out a form for me to get blood work done and told me that my job was in jeopardy and walked out of the room. Oh I should add he also got in my face while talking with a loud voice. I really didn't want to go back there but I was unsure if another doctor would release me for work if they didn't treat me. I went back to get my blood results and to see if he was willing to release me for work. My blood work came back and it showed that I had inflammation I don't know about you but I pretty much think that indicates I'm in pain. The doctor did a 360 and was once again kind. This time he did fill out my FMLA papers and I left there with the intentions of never going back. I did end up going to another doctor that a friend had recommended and brought my MRI results with me. The new doctor also did x-rays and discovered there was a problem. I am now on my way to getting therapy and proper medication. I rarely write reviews good or bad however this time I felt the need to inform anyone who has intentions on going to this location. I know the others have really good reviews and I'm sure their encounter with the doctor went well. Mine did in the beginning too. If you want to go to a doctor who never gives you A chance to explain what is going on with you then by all means this is a doctor for you I wish you luck.

Brought my mother into the ER and was highly unsatisfied. They gave her a dirty sheet. When I asked The nurse for another one she was rude about it. When the nurse  came in to get my mother antibiotics she start off the conversation by saying penicillin which I might add my mother's allergic to. I mentioned to her that my mother can't have that. She then proceeded to tell me that's why I said she's allergic to penicillin. My aunt and I both did not hear her say it. Not sure if I am making much sense when writing this review because I am angry at the moment. My point is not only was I disgusted by the dirty sheet but also by the nasty attitude of the nurse who had a mean look on her face the whole time. Oh and on a side note they can never find the remotes to the TV it's a real not a big deal but if you're gonna spend hours in the hospital it would be nice to be able to have option to watch it I assume that's what it's there for.

I had a wonderful experience yesterday for my first experience at the Aliante location. Dr. Pressley and her staff that helped me (Paige and Kimber) are professional, courteous, and helpful. I was very happy with my purchase and can't wait for my new glasses to come in.

Where to start. So basically and old old friend went here for a late night Stampede dinner. So we walked in and the waitress was really rude and slammed the plates down like she didn't give a hoot. Then I was like whoa and I had the porgies witch where dried and had a sliver of hair on it so I said nicely please take this back and have some one look at the hair so the waitress was like do I look like a bar or a fancy restaurant waitress and I was like ok whoa so We got our bills and I gave no tip. My old friend did she had an ok experience but thats just that! I wont be coming back here again. again mixed reviews on other peoples parts thats fair. The interior was dirty looking and old looking ew. The outside of the building looks tired and has had its days!! Thats all
Great Market the food is delicious and its very clean inside and out The staff are very Friendly I must say!! Although it is a little bit pricey!! But hey its a upscale market.
Great movie theater. Great staff and a happening environment! nothing bad I can say about this!!

Superb staff and great dining experience. Super clean to and accurate when you take Reservations!!   Saturday nights awesome bands come play that are classy but get up and groove!!! come on down on a weekend!!!!!!!!!!!!  I'm defiantly taking my special BF to this in may!! for a nice romantic dinner!! yummy

Very good the food amazing facility very clean!! Serves awesome! Id come back again!!
Just wish there was one in the downtown I think it would do very well!!
Dodgy at night especially for us woman. A great station but needs more security personals around.

Cool little shops great little market and have had some amazing memories!! clean but tired looking cant wait for the cool new design and how it will come to life!! the people are super friendly!! I will be coming back here again at some point!!!! Just wish the Imax was still there aww miss it!! lots of good old field trips back in my School days!!

Super fun to go with Friends Great attitude with the people fun and enthusiastic!!

 its a fun sport to do!! plus you get to shoot your friends with Lasers for revenge lol

 hehe!!  Great layout of the ramps and love the rules that they have in place!! Perfect for

 Birthday parties to!!

Awesome for family fun or with a Group or a loved one!!!!!!!  I remember going here when I was like 8 super fascinating to learn about what it was like back in the old days!! yee haw.  Id come back again for sure!! Very clean and friendly staff!

What can I say its clean its funky and great prices!!! its a great little record shop on 17th Ave.  The staff are very nice and look through Vinyls for a good hour!!  They also have a great Collection.

As we all know Calgary is an expanding City!! so is Calgary Transit.  I've had my share of good and bad!! its a all and all balance of reviews.   Some days are Great others are Horrible.   A few I could rant on but all in all not bad. I think some of the drivers could be more accurate and more pleasant.  The being on time thing is a big big one!! so if anyone reads this please know Im supportive but just a few critiques here and there!! I'm loving the new plans for the near future its going to be a greener and better system!! keep up the well done work!!
Great Customer Serves! awesome collection of skate wear!! great sales to. Store is very spaces and clean!! No downside at all. and the location best of all

Brutal how loud it is gee's and the servers dress skankey high skirts and just look trashy. Its alright inside after the renovations at least.  The food its a 1 star to.  The bands that play are alright.   I wont come back that is for sure!

Went here Last week with My BF!!  It was amazing Gee's so much selections of cool gear and cloths and gadgets!!!  10 Out of 10 for sure!! It was Clean well organized and the Staff where neat!! The prices where reasonable to not to expensive.  Just right!!
 For fact Il come back here again in the future!!! Great Job Crown Surplus keep up the great work!!

Very good but its hit and miss some times they have awesome sweaters and great rings!!  Although the staff is very friendly and very clean inside it is a cozy little Vintage shop located on 17th avenue!

To awesome for words Id come back any day!! The staff are amazingly nice and polite Great view from up top looping on the the city like an ant hill!! Love the glass floor feature!!  Nothing to complain about!!  I love making reviews super fun!!! I recommend making a visit to the Calgary Tower!!
Superb very clean and the staff are great!! cool atmosphere Love the dishes yumm nothing that I cant complain about!! In the Summer I love their roof top Patio. I'l come back again for sure!!!!!!!!!!

Best Greek food in town!!   Great people awesome clean atmosphere. Food is exquisite 
I'll be coming back here for sure!!!
Great for punkish Boutique . Very nice store clerks and cool selection Love how this store is Unisex. Very cozy layout to!! nothing to complain about.
Great layout and cool Clothing. Staff are very Friendly Id come back again. Just one thing its overpriced :-( other then that a great place!!
Very cool little strip of Calgary with dining and cool shops!! Love it in the Spring Summer its the best time to go for little Festivals and events!!

Meh it was cool and all but not my geeky type of Expo. Some of the exhibits where very neat.  I went in 2009 and I did not have a good time on Saturday its crowded to the Max and it was claustrophobia at times.  Also it was a but Disorganized and very $$$ id have to say.  Its good for people that are Comic nerds and love to dress up as their favorite super hero.

What can I saw amazing and leaves you in deep thoughts Lots of History that tells a Story !!!  Super cool Exhibits and the Museum is super organized and clean the staff are super friendly!!!! What can I say superb defiantly 10 out of 10!!!

The best I love how they change up the Exhibits very neat and they have amazing artists that sometimes come to.  Very organized and super clean gee's also the Staff are superb very friendly I'd say!! I would recommend coming here you learn a lot different cultures to through out the art!!! there is nothing to complain about what so ever.  5 stars it deserves!!!!! I'l be back for sure

Great new Facility awesome staff and cool exhibits! I'l be back again that is for sure!! great for Friends and all kinds of ages that range to families to!! Very clean and modern looking inside and out!
Yummy Ugh to good!! for a small pastry.  Yumm all I can say and very clean inside the La Boulangerie. Il be back for sure!

I've been here as a guest 4 times and It's very nice inside and out but the staff are ok but stuck up also to become a member its super Pricey gee's The pools are good for the summer!! its A - Ok I must say.  The Glencoe Golf and Country club its alright as well the golf there is up to Par.  I just feel its to judgmental at both places of how people stare at you some times. Maybe its just me but Ive had that a couple of times when I went.   The facility is cool if your that kind of person that has that kind of money and some that are stuck  up.  There is better cheaper places to go for Recreational uses around town!

Awesome digs I love this shop very cool atmosphere!!! great sales some times!! the Staff are very Friendly and very clean!!! Huge store to love how big it is. Nothing that I can complain about this review!! I'l be coming back again!!

A good experience the staff are not pushy from what I thought! the store is very nice and I love the entrance super clean and modern looking.  In there stock is not half bad some cool stuff. and good things if you need in a pinch chargers and ear phones!! reasonably priced I think some are very expensive but its what you expect. The only thing I wish they had in stock at the store is Solar Powered devices that would make it way better. Other then that a cool store
Great mall just missing a Theater inside of it!!! The mall is big clean and way less people then at Chinook Center.  Love this mall very organized and less overwhelming.

It's alright its clean enough the staff are friendly but some of the food isent good. The bands they have are good time to time. The general noise is loud at least to me but I've experienced louder in my day.   It's ok in a pinch !

Great Mall Im happy to see their expanding it. Cool shops indeed. Nothing really here to complain about!  Love the touches to the sculptures of the polar bears for the winter! and the sales in some of the stores!!! Keep the good work up.

Perfect Location!! I love the atmosphere and the staff they will become your neighbor hood friends.  Great Coffee and serves all together. The place is spick and span.!! I love their top patio over looking 4th Street!! very neat!!!

The best place Ive been in a long long time the service was Excellent Super clean and fun atmosphere.  The food was amazing to everyones liking!!! I will be coming back again yes!!! Not a thing to complain about at all.   Keep it up!!!!

Its hit and miss with the service went to the Chinook center location again tonight with some Friends. Brutal service. and barley any sauce in the pasta I had. Cleanliness Id have to say alright I suppose.

Have had the best Experiences here.  Sweet James glow my heart!! also the staff are wicked to!! Could be a bit more space's for dancing but all and all fairly clean!! Saturday is the Best nights to go for deep house or funk!! its actual music!!  I'll come back for sure someday!!
Yee Haw the best ever Love it!!!!!!!!!!!! come on out in July Peeps!!!!!!!!  Nothing to Complain about at all!!!!!!!!! gets better every year!!

I with wife and another couple went to dine here, albeit somewhat late. Wait staff seemed in a hurry to close. Couple shared a nice dish, and wife ordered salad. I ordered a large plate of traditional food to share. Couples food was good, salad nothing special, but mine was of poor quality. Heaping amount of food that had been cooked to long back and was not edible. Rather than send back and cause a scene I left with others. Examples was beef pieces cooked almost to charcoal, fried plantains hard as shoe leather, etc. I SHOULD have been told to order something else but it seems like the restaurant was willing to dump food on me that was probably recooked when I ordered. Likely won't go there again

Service at Walker's is superior to any big box store or chain, Fast service is provided by the adequate and well trained staff, and in price comparisons Walker's beats the big chains quite a bit. This is a professional pharmacy as opposed to the chains who have Pharmacy as a sideline. I am a retired Pharmacist and will tell you that this is where you should get your prescriptions filled. Leave the grass seed and Easter candy to the chains, but depend on professional Pharmacist for your health needs.
I was welcomed and able to get service promptly. Stylist understood my needs and took care of my hair cut in short order. She was most friendly and wanted to be sure everything was right.
